testcase.name: Given I launch https://account.bbc.com/signin
testcase.classname: Scenario: validate if a password of 7 or less characters is able to be used.

testcase.name: And I click "Register" now
testcase.classname: Scenario: validate if a password of 7 or less characters is able to be used.

testcase.name: And I'm on the starting page for registration
testcase.classname: Scenario: validate if a password of 7 or less characters is able to be used.

testcase.name: Given I'm on the registration page for e-mail and password
testcase.classname: Scenario: validate if a password of 7 or less characters is able to be used.

testcase.name: When The field e-mail is filled in by "whoknows@hotmail.com"
testcase.classname: Scenario: validate if a password of 7 or less characters is able to be used.

testcase.name: And Go to password field
testcase.classname: Scenario: validate if a password of 7 or less characters is able to be used.

testcase.name: And The field password is filled in with: "Whokno3"
testcase.classname: Scenario: validate if a password of 7 or less characters is able to be used.

testcase.name: Then I should receive the error: "Sorry, that password is too short. It needs to be eight characters or more."
testcase.classname: Scenario: validate if a password of 7 or less characters is able to be used.

testcase.name: Scenario: validate if a password of 7 or less characters is able to be used.

testcase.classname: Scenario: validate if a password without numbers is able to be used.

testcase.name: And Go to password field

testcase.name: And The field password is filled in with: "Whoknows"

testcase.name: Then I should receive the error: "Sorry, that password isn't valid. Please include something that isn't a letter."
